message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product. I think it would be perfect for you and I'm asking for $18,000 to start negotiations.
Alice, $18,000 is a bit steep for me. I'm really interested in the product but my budget is $12,000.  Would you be willing to come down to that price?
Bob, thanks for your offer. I understand your budget, however,  $18,000 is my absolute lowest price. This product is in high demand and I'm confident it's worth every penny. I can't go any lower.
